mapper.select: SELECT phase , CONVERT(100 * CAST(count(*) AS DECIMAL) / CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memory_record WHERE userID = #{userID}) AS DECIMAL), DECIMAL(5,1)) AS value FROM memory_record WHERE userID = #{userID} GROUP BY phase
select COUNT(*) from memory_record WHERE userID = #{userID} and CURRENT_DATE() >= next_mmry_time and phase < 6

select COUNT(*) from memory_record as mr left outer join `user` as u on mr.userID = u.userID where mr.userID = #{userID} and mr.wordID in (select word.wordID from word where word.belong_book = u.target_book)
select wordID from memory_record WHERE userID = #{userID} and CURRENT_DATE() >= next_mmry_time and phase < 6
